Topic: Illustrate plants with and without water and light.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture of a healthy plant with enough sunlight and water.
The student can draw a picture of a plant without sunlight and show its effects.
The student can draw a picture of a plant without water and show its effects.
The student can illustrate that plants need both water and light to live and grow.
The student can identify patterns by showing differences between healthy and unhealthy plants.
